ygData.subject: Re: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am sure they will make that quests extremely buggy and insane difficult to complete as all later introducing quests. For example, quest for Ice Comet was
ygData.messageBody:
"Jones, Brian" wrote:

>
> Keep reading the news, though. Instead of being dropped by a mob it is
> going to be through a class specific quest (details not known yet).
> Hopefully they will make it so that only that class can do it and change the
> warrior crafted quest where only warriors can do it.
>

I am sure they will make that quests extremely buggy and insane difficult to
complete as all later introducing quests. For example, quest for Ice Comet was
buggy from beggining for several weeks, casters research quests was made in such
manner so its more easy to train research in traditional way, quests for Necro's
high level pet words are so hards so it is much more easy to find the proper
words from regular high level mobs. Sure, it will be nightmare at Drelzna room
in next 2 days :)


--
Evgeny
